conbody.p: Select FileSettings from the main menu to set up the teacher module.

Teacher module settings window ( ) will appear on your screen. Here you can change Path to teacher foldersteacher folders where each teacher can store class files, session files, student records, etc.
Here you can also change user interface language, maximum number of groups in the class, and default sound devices for playback and capture.
By selecting Optimize audio for Wi-Fi networks (disable multicast) option you can increase sound quality over the Wi-Fi networks at the expense of increase in network traffic.

By selecting Optimize video for Wi-Fi networks (disable multicast) option you can increase video quality over the Wi-Fi networks at the expense of increase in network traffic. Once this option is enabled, students will also be able to adjust video playback position.
conbody.note: Check the Use voice switch option if you are experiencing poor sound quality over Wi-Fi networks. This will enable software voice switch that will increase sound quality at the expense of increase in sound delays and CPU load on the teacher workstation.
conbody.p: If you are using Dialog Nibelung together with the Dialog 5 audio hub (see ), you will have to set the Transmit audio using Dialog 5 audio hub option here.
You can also set the deafault size for the whiteboard (see section ) here.
